caption:
The photograph features a middle-aged man with a focused, serious expression, looking slightly away from the camera. He has short dark hair, parted on the side, and wears thick-rimmed black glasses.

He is dressed in a dark suit jacket over a white shirt with a diagonal-striped tie that combines shades of red, white, and blue, giving him a very formal and professional appearance. He is positioned in front of a microphone array, suggesting he is either making a speech or participating in a press conference.

The background is simple and nondescript, featuring vertical blue-grey drapes that help to center focus on the man himself. The overall composition of the image conveys a sense of importance and formality, indicative of a business or political setting.
title: William Ruckelshaus, first administrator of EPA
